attributes.review: I came here to support my totally amazing, non rapist/racist or pedophilic president, but was fooled! It asked me to enter my number, come on Donald that’s very in appropriate!! I can’t believe Melania has to put up with this man and I can’t believe his son wakes up everyday knowing the Cheeto is his dad 😔 THE APP CRASHES, DOESNT WANT TO DOWNLOAD AND TRUMP TALKS TOO MUCH SH** DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! 😡😡

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app because I can’t sleep. It was disgusting. 
This orange-headed fascist doesn’t believe health care, education, and equality are human rights. He doesn’t believe in climate change or science. Him and his non-mask wearing, loud minions are destroying the country.
Horrible app. Never recommend. -infinite stars
attributes.title: Tf is this

attributes.review: It took 4 days to download and when it did it was all glitchy and wouldn’t let me go on it 🤧 if I could give it 0 I would just to move the whole app please thank you
attributes.title: Horrible app ruined my life 💔

attributes.review: This app is pointless and dumb, it hacked my phone and then somehow went after my family!!!🥵🥵 now my house in invaded with British spy’s. I don’t like it because they took my muffins and they stole all our tea!!! Do not download this app if you want to be tea-less
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!!

attributes.review: after taking several hours to download i open the app and it crashes my entire phone. i then tried to uninstall it and donald trump himself STRANGLED ME THROUGH THE PHONE. he threw me to the ground and called me slurs and such. my phone was then completely hacked and destroyed. unbelievable.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER. DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD.

attributes.review: when i downloaded this hoRRIFIC app, all i saw was lies. DISGUSTING, might i say. homie who runs this must be dumb because his views are SO ASTRONOMICALLY BAD that i broke out into hives. i don’t recommend this. if i could give it negative stars i would. ok now does bernie have an app? i’ll download that ✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: this app gave me a rash

attributes.review: I wish I could even open the app. The UI/UX designer and even coder of this monstrosity is in need of an upgrade. A job is a job but it’s just such a disgusting format. As soon as I click on the app to try to open it, it fails. Get your act together Trump >:(
attributes.title: Gross

attributes.review: This app was horrible. It took 25 minutes to install and failed as a product off app store. It gave me PTSD and i was offended and felt harassed multiple times by the nasty language the pictures and how the app looks. Its a shame this is “ the official Trump app “.
attributes.title: This app

attributes.review: As soon as I started the app, my house started to smell like Cheetos. After a few days, I saw a Cheeto in the bathroom. Then another one in the kitchen. In a matter of few weeks my whole house was covered in Cheetos. I have to move now. THANK YOU.
attributes.title: They are everywhere 😡

attributes.review: This app took 4 days to download after it finally downloaded HACKERS TOOK OVER MY PHONE AND TOOK IT FOR RANSOM I had to pay 300 dollars to get it back and it’s all because this app the app layout is not even organized and stuff is misspelled overall this is the worse app ever.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP😌🤚
